/usr/bin/cc  -Wall -pedantic  -rdynamic CMakeFiles/spaceball.dir/progs/demos/spaceball/spaceball.c.o CMakeFiles/spaceball.dir/progs/demos/spaceball/vmath.c.o  -o bin/spaceball  -Wl,-rpath,/home/marco/Desktop/UFAM/LPAV/freeglut-3.2.1/lib -lGLU -lGL -lm -lX11 -lXi -lm lib/libglut.so.3.11.0 -lGL -lm -lX11 -lXi
